name: Blood Knight
description:
A 3D side scroller beat-em up, your health constantly drains and you must refill it by killing, you must kill quickly to maintain combo bonuses and continue your killstreak.

Controls/ Gameplay:

  • WASD to Move.
  • Q to heavy attack, E to light attack.
  • Space while moving to perform jump.
  • Escape to pause.

Combo Bonuses:

  • 15 Kills Speed Up
  • 25 Kills Crit Rate Up

Enemies:

  • Soldiers: attacks slow you down.
  • Knight: attacks stun you.
  • White Knight: attacks stop you attacking.
